name: web-vscode-icons
description: Vscode icons for github, gitlab and gitea

scripts.dev: mkdir dist && npm run manifest:FIREFOX && webpack -w --mode development
scripts.build:everything: npm run build:all && npm run build:minimal:all && npm run clean
scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:all:clean: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome && npm run clean
scripts.build:firefox: npm run compile && npm run manifest:FIREFOX && BROWSER=FIREFOX npm run archive && npm run clean
scripts.build:chrome: npm run compile && npm run manifest:CHROME && BROWSER=CHROME npm run archive && npm run clean
scripts.build:minimal:all: npm run build:minimal:firefox && npm run build:minimal:chrome
scripts.build:minimal:all:clean: npm run build:minimal:firefox && npm run build:minimal:chrome && npm run clean
scripts.build:minimal:firefox: npm run compile:minimal && npm run manifest:FIREFOX minimal && BROWSER=FIREFOX npm run archive minimal && npm run clean
scripts.build:minimal:chrome: npm run compile:minimal && npm run manifest:CHROME minimal && BROWSER=CHROME npm run archive minimal && npm run clean

author: Gamesmes90
